resources.string: Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Home\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
Pressing the home button will wake your device
Pressing the camera button will wake your device
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
When the screen is off, long pressing the camera key will play/pause current music track
Pressing either volume button will wake your device
When the screen is off, long pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Values higher than %1$d are not recommended
View or change CM cLock widget options

This RAM bar shows the actual android memory (RAM) utilization. Please note that having cached apps helps your device open apps much faster. For further explanations on how android memory (RAM) management works, check the help menu.
Reset RAM bar style to default?
View, select or change the layout of the displayed tiles
Dynamic tiles are not always visible and will only show up if triggered by a system event
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Close the Quick Settings panel after toggling a tile
View or change the Sound button modes
Open Quick Settings when there are no %1$s notifications present
Pocket mode will launch the lockscreen when no notifications exist
Show the notification text around the ring
Use active display style for notification details
Limit the notification to once per time period
Turn screen off with double tap
Hide notifications marked as low priority
Show pending notifications after taking the device out of your pocket
Time the proximity sensor must be covered before active display is shown
No notifications will be shown for these apps
No details will be shown for notifications from these apps
Show the date above the clock
Show AM/PM indicator when using the 12-hour time format
Put to sleep after woken by pocket mode and returned to the pocket
Restore the default displayed tiles and layout?
Close after removing the last notification
Close after removing the last removable notification
Use the same tiles and layout as the Quick Settings panel
This will automatically manage your device battery usage and switch your network to user-defined power saving mode or normal mode depending on mobile data and Wi-Fi connection states
This will automatically manage your device battery usage to user-defined
Activate power saving mode when screen turns off
When screen turns on, power saving mode won\'t be deactivated until keyguard is unlocked
Delays changing of power saving mode by specified number of seconds
Activate power saving mode when battery low
Activate power saving mode or changing screen brightness by specified battery level
Disable bluetooth connection when power saving activated
Disable mobile data connection when power saving activated
Disable gps connection when power saving activated
Disable Wi-Fi connection when power saving activated
Disable LED notification when power saving activated
Disable vibration when power saving activated
Activates brightness level change when battery low
Changing brightness level when power saver activated
This will automatically switch your maximum cpu frequency to user-defined power saving mode
we never can guarantee this will work on device
Allow changing network to normal mode with specific interval time after screen turn off and power saving mode enabled
Activate power saving mode when no network signal after 5 minutes
Disable sync connection when power saving activated
Allow to kill all task when power saving activated
Allow to showing toast message when battery saver changing device configuration
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
View or change quick settings style options
Landscape view doubles tiles per row quantity
View or change the slider targets and shortcuts
Drag the slider to targets to assign applications
View or change custom lock screen targets
Enable eight custom lock screen targets.
Changing this option resets your current lockscreen targets setup to default.
\n\nWith eight lockscreen targets enabled you cannot use your lockscreen shortcuts at the same time.
Double-tap and hold the slider to start torch
Lock screen targets reset to default
Delete all user created lock screen targets and restore to default?
Select or change the desired application or activity and the associated icon
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Shows the content behind your lockscreen, your data may be visible to those around you
Adds a nice blur effect to the background
Set the blur radius for the blur effect
Turn screen on and show all notifications when device is pulled out of pocket. Turn screen off when device gets back into pocket.
Always turn screen on when pulled out of pocket, even when there are no notifications pending
Hide low priority notifications such as google now weather notifications
Allow dismissing even non clearable notifications. Of course, they\'re just hidden from lockscreen and not from the notification panel.
Add possibility to toggle between normal and expanded view by longpress. The expanded view sometimes shows more private information so you might want to disable it.
Show notifications expanded by default. You still will be able to toggle between expanded and normal view.
Wake device when a new notification is received
Number of notifications displayed at once
Offset to the top of the screen:
Disables notifications from being shown and dismissed. This way, you just see the icons of your notifications.
Excluded applications will not show up as lockscreen notifications
Override the system color of the systemui
Restarting the System UI will significally change the values you modify.
Please enter a new label. Enter an empty label to revert to stock label.
Display the name of the currently connected Wifi network
Switch the network indicator from LTE to 4G
Network speeds text color in statusbar
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app
Pressing the camera button unlocks the device
Pressing the menu button unlocks the device
Pressing the home button unlocks the device
Where do you want the menu buttons to appear?
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Navigation bar height while in portrait.
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side.
Shows navigation bar in lanscape on the bottom
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off the navigation bar can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable pie controls instead?
Reset all style entries to default?
Change the navigation bar button color mode
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen action cannot be added twice
Change the shorcuts icon color mode
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Lock color will be set to the lock handle
Color of the widget and unlock frames
When enabled, this option will allow you to change the brightness by sliding your finger across the Statusbar. Note: Will not be active when auto-brightness is on
Top pie does not show status and clock information
Change the button icon color mode
To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are available
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off pie controls can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable navigation bar instead?
Minimum one of the main triggers (bottom, left or right) needs to be enabled.
Reduces left and right trigger size if keyboard is active
Reset progress bar style to default?
Display the number of pending notifications
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Sets the background of the notification panel header to an image based on the current date and time
